hub.start_hub:
Wellcome to the tutorials.
Let's learn some things about the game.
hub.sense:
Let's SENSE (right click or gamepad B)!!!
For demonstration it will keep for a short time.
hub.target_seen_green: This GREEEN signal is your next step.
hub.target_seen_yellow: The YELLOW one is the final point of the level.
hub.target_seen_white: WHITE are generators, where you can restore all your life.
hub.return_control:
It's your turn now.
Move with WASD + Mouse or with controller joysticks.
Try going next to the big strong boy MOLE
Then press ACTION button and enter his dream
hub.mole_tuto_complete: Congratulations for completing the MOLE tutorial
hub.sci_tuto_complete: Congratulations for completing the SCIENTIST tutorial
hub.do_other_tutorial_sci:
Now let's do the SCIENTIST tutorial
Check with sense where it is!
hub.do_other_tutorial_mole:
Now let's do the MOLE tutorial
Check with sense where it is!
hub.tutos_completed:
You completed both tutorials, fantastic!
You are able to see the teleport sphere
Let's go to the game itself!!!!
hub.dead_on_dream:
¡Oops! It was a dream fortunately...
I'll do my best next time

tuto_mole.need_higher: Necesito algo para llegar tan alto...
tuto_mole.pull_push: Pulsa W para empujar y S para estirar
tuto_mole.show_portal: ¡Mira! ¡Ésta debe ser la salida del sueño!
tuto_mole.look_wall: This wall seems weak. I wonder if there is something behind...
tuto_mole.help_possess: Get closer to the Mass and press LEFT SHIFT to control his body.
tuto_mole.help_unpossess: Press LEFT SHIFT to abandon the Mass.
tuto_mole.help_place_box: Carry the box to the broken column (you can use SENSE).
tuto_mole.help_wall:
Get closer to the wall in front of you with the Mass
and press LEFT CLICK to destroy it.
tuto_mole.help_box: Get closer to the box and press LEFT CLICK to push or pull it.
tuto_mole.help_djump: Press SPACE to jump. Press it twice to perform a double jump.

tuto_sci.help_possess:
This is SCIENTIST's dream.
Get closer to him, then press POSSESS (LEFT SHIFT or Controller Y)
to control it.
tuto_sci.help_wb:
This charcter is very clever, he can create bombs on workbenchs.
Press ACTION (LEFT CLICK or Controller X) to create some.
Also seems that you discovered how to OVERLOAD yourself,
so you can stun GUARDs with ACTION, but lots of life will be lost.
tuto_sci.help_bomb:
Throw bombs by pressing NEGATIVE (E key or controller RB).
That bombs are useful to stun GUARDS for a short time
GUARDS are the only characters that can see you...
And they want you death, be carefull!!
tuto_sci.stunned_guard_remain:
You failed!
It could have been worse... Stun the remaining guard.
tuto_sci.help_repair:
As this is a dream, the guards will remain stunt.
Now get closer to the drone and press ACTION to repair it.
tuto_sci.help_unpossess: Press POSSESS again to abandon the Scientist.
tuto_sci.help_polarity:
Press POSITIVE and NEGATIVE to toggle polarities.
Use this skill to get attracted by the drone and then repulsed up.
Direction + JUMP allows to situate on top of the drone for repulsion.
Take notice that there are also boxes with polarity around the world...
tuto_sci.help_generator:
Press ACTION near a generator to recover your energy.
In this room that will open the door.
tuto_sci.help_exit:
You have regained all your energy!
Cross the door that just opened to end this tutorial.
